InstructionData.Author: SMiLeY.NET
InstructionData.Instructions:
### Power Management ### alias Self db alias SleepToggle d0
alias CurrentTemp r0 alias CurrentBatteryRatio r1 alias PIDError r2 alias Proportional r3 alias PreviousError r4 alias Integral r5 alias Derivative r6 alias Setpoint r7 alias PIDOutput r8 alias GeneratorActive r9 alias Temp r10 alias OnState r11 alias CurrentPressure r12
define MaxTemp 310 define MinPressure 80 define MaxPressure 100
define SetPoint 0.8 # Battery Ratio define Kp 200 # Proportional Gain define Ki 40 # Integral Gain define Kd 20 # Derivative Gain define MinOutput 0 define MaxOutput 50 define FilterTicks 4 # Try 3-5 define RegulatorMode -1 # Decrease when too high define SPDeviceMultiplier 1 define MaxIntegral 20 #Integral windup clamp - tune to system define MinIntegral -20 define DeltaT 0.5
define GasFuelGenerator HASH("StructureGasGenerator") define PressureRegulator HASH("StructurePressureRegulator") define GFGRegulator HASH("Pressure Regulator - GFG") define StationBatteryHash HASH("StructureBattery") define ActiveVentHash HASH("StructureActiveVent") define GFGRoomOut HASH("Active Vent - GFG Room Out") define GFGRoomIn HASH("Active Vent - GFG Room In") define GasSensorHash HASH("StructureGasSensor") define GFGRoomSensor HASH("Gas Sensor - GFG")
Init: sbn PressureRegulator GFGRegulator On 1 move PreviousError 0 move Integral 0
Main: yield
s Self Setting CurrentTemp jal HandlePressure jal HandleFuelGenerator j Main
HandlePressure: lbn CurrentPressure GasSensorHash GFGRoomSensor Pressure Maximum #s Self Setting CurrentPressure blt CurrentPressure MinPressure IncreasePressure bgt CurrentPressure MaxPressure DecreasePressure #sbn ActiveVentHash GFGRoomOut On 0 j ra
IncreasePressure: sbn ActiveVentHash GFGRoomIn On 1 sbn ActiveVentHash GFGRoomOut On 0 j ra
DecreasePressure: sbn ActiveVentHash GFGRoomOut On 1 sbn ActiveVentHash GFGRoomIn On 0 j ra
HandleFuelGenerator: lbn CurrentTemp GasSensorHash GFGRoomSensor Temperature Maximum blt CurrentTemp MaxTemp RunGenerator sb GasFuelGenerator On 0 j ra
RunGenerator: lb CurrentBatteryRatio StationBatteryHash Ratio Average sub PIDError SetPoint CurrentBatteryRatio move Proportional PIDError mul Proportional Proportional Kp mul Temp PIDError Ki mul Temp Temp DeltaT add Integral Integral Temp min Integral MaxIntegral Integral max Integral MinIntegral Integral sub Derivative PIDError PreviousError div Derivative Derivative DeltaT mul Derivative Derivative Kd move PIDOutput Proportional add PIDOutput PIDOutput Integral add PIDOutput PIDOutput Derivative min PIDOutput MaxOutput PIDOutput max PIDOutput MinOutput PIDOutput sbn PressureRegulator GFGRegulator Setting PIDOutput #s Self Setting PIDOutput sgez GeneratorActive PIDOutput sb GasFuelGenerator On GeneratorActive move PreviousError PIDError j ra
